concept.title: Time Technology Guide
concept.shortdesc: Describes the technology involved in the Time platform service.

section.title: Real-time clock
section.p: A real-time clock is a chip that keeps track of elapsed time. It is more accurate and consumes less power than computing time from elapsed execution cycles.

section.title: Alarms
section.p: The real-time clock can generate interrupts at specific times. This provides a reliable alarm mechanism.
